org.ingatan.component.librarymanager
Class MultipleLibrarySelector

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.ingatan.component.librarymanager.MultipleLibrarySelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class MultipleLibrarySelector
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Component made up of a library browser and a selection list. With this component, the user may browse libraries by group, and use -> and <- buttons to add or remove them from a list of currently selected libraries. This component is used when setting up a quiz, and also when choosing libraries to export.

Clean up the variable names, and.. implementation a bit. This is not the neatest class.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
See Also:
Serialized Form
